author: Minyvonne Burke
title: Walmart to begin checking temperatures of store employees
description: Walmart said it will begin taking the temperatures of employees at its U.S. stores and asking them "basic health screening questions" as the company ramps up its efforts to keep workers and customers safe during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Walmart said it will begin taking the temperatures of employees at its U.S. stores and asking them "basic health screening questions" as the company ramps up efforts to keep workers and customers safe during the coronavirus pandemic.
